mapper.select: select * from tbl_board where bno > 0 order by bno desc
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY bno) AS row_num FROM tbl_board) AS numbered_rows WHERE row_num BETWEEN (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount} + 1 AND (#{pageNum}) * #{amount};
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board(title, content, writer) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
insert into tbl_board(title, content, writer) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
